sentences.en: A refinement of the calculation is warranted.
At term delivery rather than further evaluation is usually warranted.
sentences.cn: 足月时,通常终止妊娠比进一步评估更保险.

sentences.en: Closed suction drainage is not warranted in elective total joint replacement.
sentences.cn: 择期全关节置换术后无必要常规施行闭合吸引引流.

sentences.en: Do you think this fear is warranted?
sentences.cn: 你认为有必要这样害怕吗？

sentences.en: Due to the complexity of the compliance domain, an organization is unlikely to undergo successful audits if the required evidence is not readily available or cannot be warranted to be genuine.
sentences.cn: 根据法规遵循域的复杂性，如果不能容易地获取需求证据或是不能保证其真实性，一家企业是不可能成功通过审核的。

sentences.en: Further clinical ealuation is warranted in patients with comorbid diabetes and COPD.
sentences.cn: 在同时患有糖尿病和慢性阻塞性肺病患者身上更进一步的临床试验已被批准.

sentences.en: His abilities warranted his position in the company.
sentences.cn: 依他的能力,他在公司身居要职是理所当然的.

sentences.en: In severe diarrhea, parenteral administration of fluids and electrolytes is warranted.
sentences.cn: 严重的腹泻, 非肠道补液、电解质较有保障.

sentences.en: Is our O & M strategy adequate to meet warranted availability level?
sentences.cn: 运行 和 维护策略是否满足担保的可利用率水平?

sentences.en: Point out its virtues where warranted, and explain its shortcomings where indicated.
sentences.cn: 指出其哪些方面具有价值, 并解释哪些方面暴露了其缺陷.

sentences.en: Sarkozy voiced alarm at the Iranian issue, saying it warranted more attention.
sentences.cn: 萨科奇在伊朗问题上发出警告, 说它有理由得到更多重视.

sentences.en: The storekeeper warranted the quality of the coffee.
The tour price is not warranted by the use of two - star hotel.
sentences.cn: 旅游者花这么多的钱被安排住在二 星级 饭店是不合理的.

sentences.en: They bid stock prices up far beyond what the trend in real business profits warranted.
sentences.cn: 他们把股票价格哄抬到远远超过企业的实际利润趋势所能保证的股票价值.

sentences.en: This material is warranted ( to be ) pure silk.
sentences.cn: 这块料子保证是纯丝的.

words.tran_cn: 根据；证明；正当理由；委任状
保证；担保；授权；（正当）理由
